AssetClass.title: Asset Class
AssetClass.description: As defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015); Character #2

InstrumentType.title: Instrument Type
InstrumentType.description: As defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015); Character #1

UseCase.title: Product
UseCase.description: Unique label that defines the product

Level.title: Level
Level.description: Label assigned to the ISIN to describe its level in the hierarchy

elaboration.New: New ISIN added to the database
elaboration.Updated: One/several of the fields in the ISIN record is/are updated
elaboration.Expired: ISIN that has already matured relative of the specified Expiry Date
elaboration.Deleted: The instrument associated with the ISIN is no longer active

StatusReason.title: Status Reason
StatusReason.description: The reason for ISIN Status change

FullName.title: Full Name
FullName.description: Full name of the financial instrument

ClassificationType.title: Classification Type
ClassificationType.description: Indicates the type of security using ISO 10962 standard, Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code) values. ISO 10962 is maintained by ANNA (Association of National Numbering Agencies) acting as Registration Authority

CommodityDerivativeIndicator.title: Commodity Derivative Indicator
CommodityDerivativeIndicator.description: Indication as to whether the financial instrument falls within the definition of commodities derivative under Article 2(1)(30) of Regulation (EU) No 600/2014 or is a derivative relating to emission allowances referred to in Section C(4) of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU

IssuerorOperatoroftheTradingVenueIdentif.title: Issuer or Operator of the Trading Venue Identifier

ShortName.title: Short Name
ShortName.description: Short name of financial instrument in accordance with ISO 18774

ISOUnderlyingInstrumentIndex.title: ISO Underlying Instrument Index
ISOUnderlyingInstrumentIndex.description: Underlying Instrument Index represented in ISO 20022 acceptable format

ISOReferenceRate.title: ISO Reference Rate
ISOReferenceRate.description: First leg reference rate represented in ISO 20022 acceptable format

ISOOtherLegReferenceRate.title: ISO Other Leg Reference Rate
ISOOtherLegReferenceRate.description: Other leg reference rate represented in ISO 20022 acceptable format

NotionalCurrency.title: Notional Currency
NotionalCurrency.description: Currency in which the notional is denominated. Usage: Within MiFIR, in the case of an interest rate or currency derivative contract, this will be the notional currency of leg 1 or the currency 1 of the pair. Within MiFIR, in the case of swaptions where the underlying swap is single-currency, this will be the notional currency of the underlying swap. For swaptions where the underlying is multi-currency, this will be the notional currency of leg 1 of the swap

PriceMultiplier.title: Price Multiplier
PriceMultiplier.description: Number of units of the underlying instrument represented by a single derivative contract. Number of units of the underlying instrument represented by a single derivative contract. For an option on an index, the amount per index point. For spreadbets the movement in the price of the underlying instrument on which the spreadbet is based

TermofContractValue.title: Term of Contract Value
TermofContractValue.description: Value of the contract term in number of units

items.title: Instrument ISIN
items.description: ISIN code of the underlying instrument

items.title: Instrument LEI
items.description: In case the instrument is referring to an issuer, rather than to one single instrument, the LEI code of the Issuer

items.title: Underlying Instrument Index
items.description: Name of the index on which the financial instrument is based

UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermValue.title: Underlying Instrument Index Term Value
UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermValue.description: Tenor value of the underlying reference rate

UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermUnit.title: Underlying Instrument Index Term Unit
UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermUnit.description: Tenor unit of the underlying reference rate

UnderlyingCreditIndexSeries.title: Underlying Credit Index Series
UnderlyingCreditIndexSeries.description: The series identifier of a credit default swap index

UnderlyingCreditIndexVersion.title: Underlying Credit Index Version
UnderlyingCreditIndexVersion.description: The version of a credit default swap index annex

DebtSeniority.title: Debt Seniority
DebtSeniority.description: Indicates the seniority of the debt, or debt basket or index underlying a derivative

StrikePrice.title: Strike Price
StrikePrice.description: Predetermined price at which the holder will have to buy or sell the underlying instrument, or an indication that the price cannot be determined at the time of execution

StrikePriceCurrency.title: Strike Price Currency
StrikePriceCurrency.description: Currency code of the Strike price

StrikePrice.title: Strike Price
StrikePrice.description: Predetermined price at which the holder will have to buy or sell the underlying instrument, or an indication that the price cannot be determined at the time of execution

StrikePriceCurrency.title: Strike Price Currency
StrikePriceCurrency.description: Currency code of the Strike price

OptionType.title: Option Type
OptionType.description: Indication as to whether the derivative contract is a call (right to purchase a specific underlying asset) or a put (right to sell a specific underlying asset) or whether it is a chooser (right to decide whether it is a call or put prior to the expiration date)

elaboration.CALL: An option on a contract which allows its holder (buyer) to exercise the right to buy specified assets (product)
elaboration.PUTO: An option on a contract which allows its holder (buyer) to exercise the right to sell specified assets (product)
elaboration.OPTL: An option on a contract which allows its holder (buyer) to exercise the right to buy (call) or sell (put) specified assets (product); The buyer does not have to decide whether the contract will be a put or a call until an agreed future date, prior to expiration

OptionExerciseStyle.title: Option Exercise Style
OptionExerciseStyle.description: Indicates when the option can be execercised. A Bermudan option can be execercised only on predetermined date; American option can be exercised at anytime prior to and including its expiry date; A European option can only be exercised at the expiry date

elaboration.AMER: An option on a contract which allows its holder (buyer) to exercise the right to buy (call) or sell (put) specified assets (product) at a fixed price at any time during the term of the put option, up to and including the expiration date of the contract
elaboration.BERM: An option on a contract which allows its holder (buyer) to exercise the right to buy (call) or sell (put) specified assets (product) at a fixed price on a number of specific dates within the exercise period of the contract
elaboration.EURO: An option on a contract which allows its holder (buyer) to exercise the right to buy (call) or sell (put) specified assets (product) at a fixed price, only on the contract's expiration date

BaseProduct.description: The first commodity of the basis swap represents the receiving leg, the second commodity of the basis swap represents that paying leg
BaseProduct.title: Base Product

SubProduct.title: Sub Product
SubProduct.description: Sub product taxonomy of commodity product

OtherBaseProduct.description: The first commodity of the basis swap represents the receiving leg, the second commodity of the basis swap represents that paying leg
OtherBaseProduct.title: Other Base Product

OtherSubProduct.title: Other Sub Product
OtherSubProduct.description: Sub product taxonomy of commodity product

TransactionType.title: Transaction Type
TransactionType.description: Transaction type as specified by the trading venue

FinalPriceType.title: Final Price Type
FinalPriceType.description: Final price type as specified by the trading venue

items.description: Identifies the reference rate for the instrument

items.description: Identifies the reference rate for the instrument

items.title: Reference Rate
items.description: Identifies the reference index for the instrument

ReferenceRateTermUnit.title: Reference Rate Term Unit
ReferenceRateTermUnit.description: Tenor unit of the first leg reference rate

items.title: Reference Rate
items.description: Identifies the reference index for the instrument

OtherLegReferenceRateTermValue.title: Other Leg Reference Rate Term Value
OtherLegReferenceRateTermValue.description: Tenor value of the other leg reference rate

OtherLegReferenceRateTermUnit.title: Other Leg Reference Rate Term Unit
OtherLegReferenceRateTermUnit.description: Tenor unit of the other leg reference rate

OtherNotionalCurrency.title: Other Notional Currency
OtherNotionalCurrency.description: In the case of multi-currency or cross-currency swaps the currency in which leg 2 of the contract is denominated; For swaptions where the underlying swap is multi-currency, the currency in which leg 2 of the swap is denominated
